pr_title: DB-10184 Add SYSIBM.SYSKEYCOLUSE as a system view

timeline.message: DB-10184 Add SYSIBM.SYSKEYCOLUSE as a system view

timeline.bodyText: Please use the right view name in the log message.
timeline.author: yxia92

timeline.bodyText: I think we can use sys.syschemas here instead. I'm considering two reasons: 1) So far, schema restriction hasn't been applied to all the views in sysibm schema yet, so we can be consistent here. 2) the schemasview in your view definition is used only in the second UNION branch, so the schema restriction is not applied in a complete way.
